rows.label: qev095801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey there! Nice to meet you. I've heard all the stories,
and I have to say you sound like quite the busy bee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Oh, I don't begrudge you that success, of course.
I'm just hoping you might throw a little of your famous
assistance my way. ...Eh? Eeeeeeh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0003
rows.name:
See, my team is understaffed. WOEFULLY understaffed.
But everyone just keeps telling me to view it as a
challenge, or a path to growth, or...something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0004
rows.name:
But when even the simplest jobs are out of reach,
just putting food on the table is a tiiiiiny bit more
important than wacky dreams of self-improvement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0005
rows.name: Anyway, um... I'd be really grateful for your support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev095801_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer to help Enrai.

rows.label: qev095801_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev095801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ignore Enrai's request.

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0006
rows.name: Oh, thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0007
rows.name:
We'll have to split the reward money between us,
but just name your cut and I'll do my best to see that
you get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0008
rows.name:
For the moment, just keeping my team together is my
top priority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Hmm. Well, I understand that you may be...less than
sympathetic to the struggles of your competitors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0010
rows.name:
But we're swallowing our pride here!
Hell, I'm practically BEGGING for your help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0011
rows.name: So, um, maybe you might reconsider your decision?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Look, I'm mortified to put you on the spot like this.
I'm not the kind of guy who is generally given to
relying on the sympathy of others, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0013
rows.name: But thanks for the chance to explain my situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0014
rows.name:
Anyway, I need your help checking out a data probe
over in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0015
rows.name:
It was destroyed a while back, and though it's since
been repaired, the cause of the destruction was never
actually determined.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0016
rows.name:
Those probes are the lifeblood of the Pathfinders,
and data from the ones in Sylvalum is essential for
gaining information about Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0017
rows.name:
Under normal circumstances, our priority would have
been to head out there, figure out what happened,
and make sure it doesn't happen again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0018
rows.name:
But then that massive Ganglion war machine appeared,
and priorities... Well, they shifted. Which I totally get.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0019
rows.name:
So the investigation was postponed for a while.
But now that we're finally ready to move forward with
it, the other teams we partnered with have backed out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0020
rows.name:
And there's no way my team can take on a task of this
size all by our lonesome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0021
rows.name:
Oh, and there are also rumors flying around that the
Ganglion are to blame for the data probe's destruction,
which doesn't exactly make folks leap up to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0022
rows.name:
So, um, yeah. This mission is kinda...dangerous.
But you're pretty much the only one I can ask for help
at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0023
rows.name:
So if I haven't scared you off yet, head out to Sylvalum
and figure out what destroyed that data probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0024
rows.name: I'm counting on you. Heck, we all are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0025
rows.name:
They say you defeated that enormous Ganglion
death machine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Well if you did THAT, then my little mission is going to
be a walk in the park![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095801_MSG0027
rows.name: We're all counting on you.[ST:wait ]
